name: Magical Forrest
description:
Game Jam Entry for the BuddyUpJam-Winter22.

Couldnt really get into the jam because it overlapped with my France Vacation. 

Basically worked on this for less than 24 hours in total.

Its a small prototype which I had very much fun with! I think i will continue to work on it!

Can you reach the true ending of this demo????

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look/Aim

F - Interact with objects

Space - Jump/Scroll Text

Shift - Sprint (when unlocked)

If interested in the SourceCode you may look here: https://github.com/realTobby/BuddyUpJam1
